parameters.name: ArcRadius
parameters.description: Radius to be used in the circular sketch pattern

parameters.name: ArcAngle
parameters.description: Angle relative to the sketch entities being patterned

parameters.name: PatternNum
parameters.description: Total number of instances, including the seed geometry

parameters.name: PatternSpacing
parameters.description: Spacing between pattern instances in radians

parameters.name: PatternRotate
parameters.description: True to rotate the pattern, false to not

parameters.name: DeleteInstances
parameters.description: Number of instances to delete passed as a string formatted as: "( a ) ( b ) ( c ) "

title: IModelDoc2.CreateCircularSketchStepAndRepeat
signature:
System.Boolean CreateCircularSketchStepAndRepeat( 
   System.Double
ArcRadius
,
   System.Double
ArcAngle
,
   System.Int32
PatternNum
,
   System.Double
PatternSpacing
,
   System.Boolean
PatternRotate
,
   System.String
DeleteInstances
)

parameters.name: ArcRadius
parameters.description: Radius to be used in the circular sketch pattern

parameters.name: ArcAngle
parameters.description: Angle relative to the sketch entities being patterned

parameters.name: PatternNum
parameters.description: Total number of instances, including the seed geometry

parameters.name: PatternSpacing
parameters.description: Spacing between pattern instances in radians

parameters.name: PatternRotate
parameters.description: True to rotate the pattern, false to not

parameters.name: DeleteInstances
parameters.description: Number of instances to delete passed as a string formatted as: "( a ) ( b ) ( c ) "

returns: True if the sketch pattern was created successfully, false otherwise
